t: Chapter 28B. Low-Income Housing Tax Credit Fund.

c.x: “Administrative costs” means the costs of the Department to administer, man
“Department” means the Department of Housing and Community Development.
“Developer” means a person or entity that proposes to cause the constructio
“Fund” means the Low-Income Housing Tax Credit Fund established by § 42-285
“Low-Income Housing Tax Credit Program” means the program authorized by sec
“User fee” means a fee charged by the Department to a developer in connecti
There is hereby established a lapsing fund known as the Low-Income Housing
Money in the Fund shall be expended by the Department only for administrati
All income and expenses of the Fund shall be audited annually by the Mayor.
